means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 卡奇 Cage的变体

sentence.Network_en: He could cadge a ride from somebody.
sentence.Network_cn: 他可以请求别人搭他一程。

sentence.Network_en: I managed to cadge some money off my dad.
sentence.Network_cn: 我设法从我父亲那里要了一些钱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... cacophony 难听的声音 cadge 乞讨；占便宜 cajole (以甜言蜜语)哄骗.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cacophony ? n. 刺耳的声音 cadge ? v. 行乞，乞求 cajole ? v. 哄骗.

list.abs: He was always cadging cigarettes from me ., 他总是向我要烟抽.
Poor old uncle Tompson used to cadge some money for cigarettes from me ., 可怜的汤普森大叔从前常常从我这里讨些钱买香烟抽.
The police arrested 8 persons who forged and cadged artificial college matriculate notice ., 警察在本月初逮捕了 8 名伪造和贩卖假大学录取通知书的人.
防喷器吊装梁 installing beam, BOP笼梯 cadge ladder电机护罩 cover,motor

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)looking for an opportunity to obtain something without paying for it
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)寻找免费获得某物的机会

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the dialect sense 'carry about'): back-formation from the noun cadger, which dates from the late 15th cent., denoting (in northern English and Scots) an itinerant dealer, whence the verb sense 'hawk, peddle', giving rise to the current verb senses from the early 19th cent

entry.def: If someone cadges food, money, or help from you, they ask you for it and succeed in getting it.

example.ex: He could cadge a ride from somebody.
example.tran: 他可以请求别人搭他一程。

means.word_mean: 1. ask for and get free; be a parasite
2. obtain or seek to obtain by cadging or wheedling;

sentences.sentence: "he is always shnorring cigarettes from his friends"

auth_sentence.content: If you can cadge an invite to the office party of the company where you want to work, you might get an inside scoop.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you can cadge an invite to the office party of the company where you want to work, you might get an inside scoop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you can cadge an invite to the office party of the company where you want to work, you might get an inside scoop.

sentences.en: I managed to cadge a ride with a lorry driver.
sentences.cn: 我求一个卡车司机免费载了我一程。
